channel.title: NoClassDefFoundError/"Main" Class
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How can i fix this? (it does the same thing for the client)

item.title: NoClassDefFoundError/"Main" Class
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

An example would be something like this in the run batch:

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: NoClassDefFoundError/"Main" Class
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

I have the server.class…How can i check to see if the path is correct?

Read full topic

item.title: NoClassDefFoundError/"Main" Class
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The JVM can’t find the server class. Either server.class does not exist or the path is incorrect.

Read full topic

item.description:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

How can i fix this? (it does the same thing for the client)
